001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper;
002
003import org.bukkit.World;
004import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
005import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.ConfigSerializable;
006import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.meta.Setting;
007
008import java.util.HashMap;
009import java.util.Iterator;
010import java.util.Map;
011import java.util.Optional;
012
013@ConfigSerializable
014public final class WorldsConfig<C> implements Iterable<Map.Entry<String, C>> {
015    public static final String DEFAULT = "default";
016
017    private final @Setting(nodeFromParent = true) Map<String, C> handle = new HashMap<>();
018
019    public Map<String, C> handle() { return handle; }
020
021    public Optional<C> get(String key) {
022        return Optional.ofNullable(handle.getOrDefault(key, handle.get(DEFAULT)));
023    }
024
025    public Optional<C> get(World key) { return get(key.getName()); }
026
027    @NotNull
028    @Override
029    public Iterator<Map.Entry<String, C>> iterator() {
030        return handle.entrySet().iterator();
031    }
032}
